meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat depression.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed amitriptylines to help with her sadness.
meanings.sent2: She picked up her amitriptylines from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: The amitriptylines danced in the bottle, ready to chase away the blues.
meanings.sent4: Her mind became a garden of happiness after taking the amitriptylines.
meanings.sent5: The amitriptylines were like little sunbeams for her mood.

meanings.sent1: The nurse handed out the amitriptylines to the patients.
meanings.sent2: They discussed the benefits of amitriptylines in their group therapy session.
meanings.sent3: The amitriptylines in the bottle whispered jokes to each other.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the calming presence of the amitriptylines.
meanings.sent5: Each of the amitriptylines was a tiny warrior against despair.
